name: Tank Top TV
overview:
Tank Top TV aggregates listings for TV shows available online from services like BBC iPlayer, 4 On Demand and others. Users can personalize their listings by indicating what they do and don’t watch. The resulting programme lists filter out what the user isn’t interested in, so that it’s easier to find shows they do want to watch.

Tank Top TV’s personalized listings technology can be licensed for building into set-top boxes and electronic programme guides.
